scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p /tmp/flutter && cd /tmp/flutter && curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.29.1-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:/tmp/flutter/flutter/bin" && cd $INIT_CWD && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
